meanings.sent1: I have a lot of paperworks to finish before the end of the day.
meanings.sent2: The office manager handles all the paperworks for the team.
meanings.sent3: Trying to organize all these paperworks is like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The stack of paperworks on my desk is a mountain I must conquer.
meanings.sent5: The paperworks piled up on the table are a visual reminder of my responsibilities.

meanings.definition: Documents or forms that need to be completed or processed.
meanings.sent1: Make sure you submit all the paperworks to HR by Friday.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer reviewed the legal paperworks before the court hearing.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled coffee on the important paperworks - oops!
meanings.sent4: The paperworks waiting on my desk are like a silent to-do list.
meanings.sent5: The paperworks in the filing cabinet hold the history of our company's transactions.
